item.description:
Winedown @ Harvard Book Store

and

Budget Travel Workshop


Harvard Book Store is excited to welcome researchers and research managers from Let's Go Publications for an evening of conversation, travel tips, and, of course, a little vino.

Fifty years ago, Oliver Koppell, a Harvard undergraduate, began the Let's Go travel guide series, with the goal to make the travel experience more accessible, particularly to students on a budget. The tradition continues today with a wide range of titles offering tips for traveling to all parts of globe for students and the young at heart. Let's Go's student researchers and writers aim to provide travel content for life changing, and world changing, experience.

In the time of year when New Englanders are itching to escape the cold and see the world, we'll spend the evening gathering ideas for how (and where) to travel on a budget, how to stay safe, and when the best times are to get up and go!
item.how_to_find_us: No organizer will be present. See message below.
item.name: Travel Winedown @ Harvard Book Store
